Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a 44-ball 59 not out
Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav stitched a 98-run stand in just 7 overs
India posted 192 for 2 vs Hong Kong in Dubai
Post-Match Reflections: With his 31st T20I fifty and his first in the format since the home series against the West Indies in February, Virat Kohli equalled Rohit Sharma's record for the most number of fifty-plus scores in T20I cricket.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kohli hit 3 sixes and a boundary for his 44-ball 59
Suryakumar Yadav went berserk for a 26-ball 68
Suryakumar hit 6 sixes and as many boundaries, including 4 sixes in the final over
